job_title: Referral to Treatment Validator in Manchester, England
pros: Great employer especially for people with children
cons: Location parking hours busy none stop

review_title: Rock solid role but limited job satisfaction
pros:
- Solid pension
- Generally supportive working environment
cons:
- Limited scope for CPD due to constant funding cuts
- Focus on getting the job done, not helping the staff reach their maximum potential

job_title: Front Desk Receptionist in Moston, England
pros: Work well within your team
cons: Not very good management. Not the right people in high positions

pros:
Supportive management 
Many training opportunities available

Location
Well known hospital

job_title: Data Analyst in Manchester City Centre, England
pros: Good benefits and strong sector reputation
cons: Quite slow to get things done in the NHS

review_title: Poor change management, cronyism takes precedent over ability.
job_title: Manager in Manchester City Centre, England
pros: Flexible working policies work well sometimes, annual leave allocation is generous. Internal professional development opportunities available.
cons: Management appointments are sometimes questionable. Agreed job desciptions and person specifications are ignored to appoint individuals, who care more about career advancement than patient care. Key performance figures are massaged to show backlogs in a favourable light prior to inspections. An atmosphere of mistrust and cronyism exists, people only stay for the flexitime.

review_title: Good opportunities, but poor work/life balance
pros:
- training opportunities available
- supportive colleagues in some areas
cons:
- not enough staff for the workload, leading to unsafe practice
- shift times (can be expected to finish at 9.30pm and be back in at 7.30am next morning, no day off between finishing nights and starting days)

job_title: Clinical Support Manager in Manchester, England
pros: Best things are the pension and holidays. If you get a good boss you can build up flexible working hours so you can get two days of per month
cons: Ever changing policies and constraints. Always following guidelines to hit targets, rather than focussing on a patients needs.

review_title: Great place to work - if you like busy!!
pros: Really supportive team with lots of opportunity to be creative and work in varied and challenging environments.
cons: Parking is an issue so familiarise yourself with the local neighbourhood.

pros: The staff team are amazing and all give 110%. The team works well together and it is a pleasant place to work
cons: Like all camhs teams there are pressures for outcomes and high caseloads. The higher management are quite removed and communication can be poor.

pros: worked throughout my final year in Uni, the management were really supportive to my studies. The staff were friendly and welcoming.  Really good flexible working in my department.
cons: Nothing comes to mind.

pros: Amazing staff whom care about each other
cons: Long hours ... reasonable pay for the demands

review_title: Great place to work, as with all NHS can be frustrating
job_title: Director of Turnaround in Sheffield, England
pros: Great range of opportunities eys
cons: Larger NHS Trusts mean more difficult to get things done

pros: Is a great teaching hospital .
cons: Under staffing can be an issue

job_title: Food and Beverage in Manchester, England
pros: Decent pay and benefits with nhs contract
cons: Always trying to save money so you find it runs with the bare minimum of staff.

pros: Stable job and great pension
cons: Poor Management style by senior members of staff is a bit of a deterent from staying

pros: Good benefits, nice teams to different departments.
cons: Understaffed, no longer any overtime, no real input from senior management, really hard to progress.

review_title: No opportunity to progress into management
pros: Good use of new technologies
cons: No opportunity to progress. Much of the work is outsourced to contractors.

review_title: amazing hospital, great people, underpaid over worked!
pros: location, facilities, experience and envoirment
cons: pay and food at the hospital

pros: Lovely manager happy place to work
cons: None at all  All staff were great
